channel.title: Players abusing combat PI - Not sure how to fix
channel.description:
So I have this boss, and basically two players will attack him from each side, set up like so
[code] player boss player [/code]
and attack the boss using range or mage. Now, since the boss switches attackers, he tries to walk back and forth between the two players, but with the correct timing, the boss will get stuck in an infinite loop of switching, walking between the players but not attacking them. The boss uses melee, range, and mage to attack, but still gets caught in said loop and won't attack either player. Any suggestions?

Java-RSPS-Noob:

another option would be to to make the range of the bosses attack is further than the attack range of the player. This way if the boss ranges/mages it can just auto attack that player then swap to the next player
